mapper.update: INSERT INTO MESSAGE_H(SEQ, SEND_ID, TAKE_ID, CONTENTS, RDATE) VALUES(SEQ_MESSAGE.NEXTVAL, #{send_id}, #{take_id}, #{contents}, NULL)
mapper.select: SELECT A.*, B.NAME FROM( SELECT * FROM MESSAGE_H WHERE SEQ=#{seq}) A JOIN USER_H B ON (A.SEND_ID=B.ID)

SELECT T1.* FROM( SELECT T.IDX, T.SEQ, T.SEND_ID, T.TAKE_ID, T.CONTENTS, TO_CHAR(T.WDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') WDATE, TO_CHAR(T.RDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') RDATE, T.STATE, T.NAME, T.TOTAL FROM( SELECT ROWNUM IDX, LST.SEQ, LST.SEND_ID, LST.TAKE_ID, LST.CONTENTS, LST.WDATE, LST.RDATE, LST.STATE, B.NAME, LST.TOTAL FROM( SELECT SEQ, SEND_ID, TAKE_ID, CONTENTS, WDATE, RDATE, STATE, ROWNUM, MAX(ROWNUM) OVER() TOTAL FROM MESSAGE_H
AND CONTENTS LIKE '%' || #{words} || '%' ORDER BY WDATE ) LST JOIN USER_H B ON(LST.SEND_ID=B.ID)
WHERE ROWNUM <= (( 10 * (#{PAGE_NUM}-1))+10 ) ) T WHERE T.IDX >= (10 * (#{PAGE_NUM}-1)+1) ) T1

SELECT T1.*, T2.* FROM( SELECT T.IDX, T.SEQ, T.SEND_ID, T.TAKE_ID, T.CONTENTS, TO_CHAR(T.WDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') WDATE, TO_CHAR(T.RDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') RDATE, T.STATE, T.NAME FROM( SELECT ROWNUM IDX, LST.SEQ, LST.SEND_ID, LST.TAKE_ID, LST.CONTENTS, LST.WDATE, LST.RDATE, LST.STATE, B.NAME FROM( SELECT SEQ, SEND_ID, TAKE_ID, CONTENTS, WDATE, RDATE, STATE FROM MESSAGE_H WHERE SEND_ID=#{SENDID} ORDER BY WDATE ) LST JOIN USER_H B ON(LST.SEND_ID=B.ID) WHERE ROWNUM <= (( 10 * (#{PAGE_NUM}-1))+10 ) ) T WHERE T.IDX >= (10 * (#{PAGE_NUM}-1)+1) ) T1 NATURAL JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) TOTAL FROM MESSAGE_H WHERE SEND_ID=#{SENDID} ) T2

SELECT T1.*, T2.* FROM( SELECT T.IDX, T.SEQ, T.SEND_ID, T.TAKE_ID, T.CONTENTS, TO_CHAR(T.WDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') WDATE, TO_CHAR(T.RDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') RDATE, T.STATE, T.NAME FROM( SELECT ROWNUM IDX, LST.SEQ, LST.SEND_ID, LST.TAKE_ID, LST.CONTENTS, LST.WDATE, LST.RDATE, LST.STATE, B.NAME FROM( SELECT SEQ, SEND_ID, TAKE_ID, CONTENTS, WDATE, RDATE, STATE FROM MESSAGE_H WHERE TAKE_ID=#{TAKEID} ORDER BY WDATE ) LST JOIN USER_H B ON(LST.SEND_ID=B.ID) WHERE ROWNUM <= (( 10 * (#{PAGE_NUM}-1))+10 ) ) T WHERE T.IDX >= (10 * (#{PAGE_NUM}-1)+1) ) T1 NATURAL JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) TOTAL FROM MESSAGE_H WHERE TAKE_ID=#{TAKEID} ) T2
